meaningMnemonic: The <radical>leader</radical> of the <radical>restaurant</radical> says, "<kanji>Halt</kanji>!" to everyone who wants to come in. The leader looks them up and down. Stares into their eyes. And then, maybe, they may go into the restaurant to eat.
readingMnemonic: People only <kanji>halt</kanji> because they want this restaurant's world famous <reading>ta</reading>ter (てい) tots. Which is probably why there is a leader out front making sure only people who can really appreciate the tater tots can get in to eat them.
